author: raz
title: Fund7Proposals + SDGs - Cardano AIM
description: Connecting SDGs + Catalyst Proposals require analyses + evaluation.We ask for support to continue work in Fund 7 as we have done for Fund 6.
solution: Analyse Fund 7 funded proposals for SDGs connections. Present data + info in an open access database. Share with media + potential partners.
experience: Fund 6 funded proposers, Cardano AIM team (voter-tool, CA-tool, vCA-Tool, Proposer Tool), Educators, Researchers, network to relevant orgs
